participant_1.background:
I like to donate time at the local animal shelter.
I had two cats growing up.
I have two children.
I like to hunt.
Both my parents were teachers.

participant_2.background:
I work as an extra for major motion pictures.
I am an aspiring writer.
I am a painter and love to create art.
I have a set of identical twin brothers.
I am a talented singer and have won several competitions.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking.
That's good to hear. What are you up to today?
I'm currently working on a painting of a beautiful landscape.
Wow, that sounds really nice. I love painting. What kind of paintings do you like to do?
I love to do landscapes, as well as portraits and abstracts. I'm also an aspiring writer, and I've been working on a novel for the past few years.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to write a novel, but I've never been able to finish one.
It's definitely a challenge, but it's also very rewarding.
I can imagine. What's your novel about?
It's a historical fiction novel set in the 19th century. It's about a young woman who goes on a journey to find her father, who has been missing for years.
That sounds really interesting! I'd love to read it when it's finished.
Thanks! I'm still working on it, but I'm hoping to have it finished by the end of the year.
Good luck with it! I'm sure it's going to be great.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to hunt, I have two children, and I donate time at the local animal shelter.
That's awesome! I love animals too. I have a set of identical twin brothers and I am a talented singer who has won several competitions.
That's really cool! I'm glad to hear that you have such a great life.
